Key Match Events: Nikola Jokic tallied a triple-double with 16 points, 13 assists, and 12 rebounds
Shai Gilgeous-Alexander scored 28 points, had 8 assists, and 7 rebounds
Chet Holmgren had 25 points, 14 rebounds, and 4 blocks
Pre-Game Insights: The Nuggets had a 1-4 preseason record, the second-worst in the Western Conference
The Nuggets lost key players like Kentavious Caldwell-Pope and Reggie Jackson, while they added Russell Westbrook and Dario Saric
Post-Match Reflections: Nikola Jokic said the Nuggets need to improve on everything after a rough preseason
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Thunder dominated the Nuggets en route to a 102-87 win
Others: Russell Westbrook, in his Nuggets debut, shot 2-for-10 and finished with six points
Jamal Murray and Aaron Gordon had 12 points, Michael Porter Jr. had 15 and Christian Braun added 16
